Text: dutch film In Rotterdam, the garage of four friendly car mechanics. All are at work among themselves tough guys, but they each have their problems at home. Everything seems to play around until three colleagues discovered that the owner has a tax of 40,000 euros. A plan must be made ​​to save the day. Colleague Youssoef inadvertently brings the solution: the Rotterdam Marathon sponsored walk. Sponsors must be found and the men have to work to get in shape. This is not easy for the friends of beers, smoking and vetkleppen account.
